name: Abstinence Sexuality Education
description: As debate over the worth of abstinence-only-until-marriage message vs. a more comprehensive and educational approach intensifies, states have created content requirements for sexuality and HIV/STD education. Abstinence education can include an abstinence pledge and be the only information about STDs provided. This isn't helpful, as the pledge is likely to be "broken", and no other information was provided, leading to STD transmission anyway. The best way to prevent against STD transmission is to get tested!

source.name: Guttmacher Institute
